item.title: Ellen DeGeneres Says She Moved to the U.K. Because of Donald Trump: Life ‘Is Just Better’ Here
item.description: Ellen DeGeneres says she decided to make the U.K. her permanent home because of Donald Trump’s re-election as U.S. President. Making her first public appearance since leaving the U.S. last year,
